Package org.vraptor.scope

Interface Summary
ApplicationContext  
Context A simple context, similar to a map.
RequestContext The request context.
 

Class Summary
DefaultApplicationContext The basic implementation of the application context.
DefaultLogicRequest Basic vraptor logic request.
DefaultRequestContext A simple request context.
FlashContext A flash context lives through the current and following request only.
SessionContext Simple decorator for the session, builds up some basic functionality.
 

Enum Summary
ScopeType All scope types for injection and outjection.
